page.home.reassuranceBanner.section1Text: The tickets that we sell have the same prices as the carriers’.
page.home.reassuranceBanner.alt.section1: Find the best price for your journey
Find the best price for your trip
Compare and book train and bus tickets for Renfe, Alsa, plus many more.
Compare and book train and bus tickets for SNCF, Eurostar, Trenitalia, Renfe, Flixbus and many more.
Compare and book your tickets to travel with SNCF, OUIGO, Eurostar and more than 200 other carriers.
page.home.reassuranceBanner.section2Text: As well as your frequent traveller cards.
page.home.reassuranceBanner.alt.section2: Get your loyalty points and discounts
We accept Renfe loyalty cards, Tarjeta Dorada, Tarjeta Joven Renfe and all other major cards.
Use your loyalty cards and buy your tickets at even cheaper prices.
We accept discount cards and SNCF, TGVmax, G30 and other subscriptions.
page.home.reassuranceBanner.section3Text: PayPal, Amex and all international credit cards are accepted.
page.home.reassuranceBanner.alt.section3: Enjoy effortless journeys when you use tickets on your phone to skip the queues.
Enjoy smooth journeys when you use tickets on your phone to skip station queues.
We accept PayPal, Apple Pay, Visa, Amex and all international bank cards.
page.home.reassuranceBanner.alt.section4: Buy tickets with PayPal, Apple Pay, Visa, Amex and all international credit cards.

SeoContent.descriptions.cheapTrainTicket: Cheap train tickets - buy in advance and save 51%*

We help you save on rail tickets by highlighting the cheapest prices for your next UK {nationalRailLink} booking. You can benefit from great savings when buying your train tickets in advance. If you are flexible with your time of travel, use our {bestFareFinderLink} to find {cheapTrainTicketsLink} other customers have found.

So, what are you waiting for? For simple, hassle-free booking you can find all the prices and timetables for trains and buses using our simple booking platform. We’ll automatically compare the prices of different tickets across all operators, so you don’t have to.
SeoContent.descriptions.planningYourJour: Use the Trainline {journeyPlannerLink} to plan and book your next trip or check our {trainTimesLink} to ensure you catch your chosen train on the day of travel. Our handy {ticketAlertLink} can also be used to notify you when advance tickets become available, so you can plan your train travel well in advance.

Travelling across Europe? No problem! We have over 200 rail and bus operators covering 40+ countries waiting to take you on your next adventure. For more information on {trainsInEULink} or travelling {europeByBusLink} we’ve got you covered, right here and in one great {appLink}.
